projects.title: Sentiment Analysis and Prediction on Indonesian Presidential Candidature
projects.description: This project employed sentiment analysis to predict public opinion regarding Indonesian presidential candidates using Twitter/X data. The study compared the performance of Logistic Regression, LSTM, and BERT models, finding that BERT consistently delivered the highest accuracy after addressing class imbalance and fine-tuning. The best-performing BERT model was then integrated into a web application enabling real-time sentiment analysis of text, offering valuable insights into public sentiment trends and demonstrating the practical application of advanced NLP techniques for informed electoral understanding.
responsibility: Responsible for all aspects of the project

projects.title: Service Orchestration
projects.description: This project delivers a comprehensive solution for rapid network issue resolution and proactive service management. It provides real-time visibility into network health, automated root cause analysis, and proactive alerting. The system quantifies service impact and potential revenue loss, integrates with external tools for seamless data sharing, and incorporates robust data integrity checks, accessible incident reporting, and secure user management. This enables faster problem identification, improved network stability, and informed decision-making.

projects.title: TM NGOSS NGT AI
projects.description: Telekom Malaysia's Next Generation Operations Support Service (TM NGOSS) project, incorporating Next Generation Transport (NGT) and Artificial Intelligence (AI), aims to revolutionize network management and enhance customer satisfaction. The project achieves this by correlating alarms network-wide to identify root causes, dramatically reducing alarm volume. Core components such as root-cause analysis, automation, and service impact analysis contribute to a significant reduction in problem resolution time â€“ exceeding 50%. This results in faster, more accurate fixes, while proactive customer communication improves service quality and the overall customer experience. The future-proof NGOSS framework ensures the solution's long-term adaptability and value, evolving alongside the network to meet future challenges

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis and Prediction on Indonesian Presidential Candidature
projects.description: The primary goal is to perform sentiment prediction and assess different models to determine the most effective method for analyzing public sentiment surrounding the 2024 Indonesian presidential election. The study compared several sentiment prediction models, including LR, LSTM, and BERT. Each model used customized text-processing techniques to optimize performance. Class balancing methods were applied to address dataset imbalances where specific sentiment categories dominated, ensuring fair and unbiased predictions. The most effective model was selected and implemented through rigorous testing into a system capable of accurately predicting sentiments.
